languages.text: {n}Абеляр хмурится — старого офицера явно гнетет то, что он услышал.{/n} "Ох неспокойно мне... пускай Лорд-капитан и отчитал{rt_mf|ся|ась}, что все в порядке. Что-то в голосе не так... Хотя, там же и проктор..."

{n}Abelard furrows his brow — what he just heard does not sit well with the old officer.{/n} "Oh, I feel uneasy, even though the Lord Captain did report that everything is fine. Something about {rt_mf|his|her} voice wasn't quite right... Then again, the Proctor is there too..."
languages.original_text: {n}Абеляр хмурится — старого офицера явно гнетет то, что он услышал.{/n} "Ох неспокойно мне... пускай Лорд-капитан и отчитал{rt_mf|ся|ась}, что все в порядке. Что-то в голосе не так... Хотя, там же и проктор..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard furrows his brow — what he just heard does not sit well with the old officer.{/n} "Oh, I feel uneasy, even though the Lord Captain did report that everything is fine. Something about {rt_mf|his|her} voice wasn't quite right... But then again, the Proctor is there too..."

{n}Abelard furrows his brow — what he just heard does not sit well with the old officer.{/n} "Oh, I feel uneasy, even though the Lord Captain did report that everything is fine. Something about {rt_mf|his|her} voice wasn't quite right... Then again, the Proctor is there too..."

{n}Abelard, scarlet with rage, does not shout but rather roars at the quailing guards:{/n} "Bring the governor! Here! NOW! Or I shall exercise my right as first officer and start blasting this planet out of orbit!"

{n}Abelard furrows his brow — what he just heard does not sit well with the old officer.{/n} "Oh, I feel uneasy, even though the Lord Captain did report that everything is fine. Something about {rt_mf|his|her} voice wasn't quite right... Then again, the Proctor is there too..."

{n}Abelard furrows his brow — what he just heard does not sit well with the old officer.{/n} "Oh, I feel uneasy, even though the Lord Captain did report that everything is fine. Something about {rt_mf|his|her} voice wasn't quite right... Then again, the Proctor is there too..."

{n}Abelard furrows his brow — what he just heard does not sit well with the old officer.{/n} "Oh, I feel uneasy, even though the Lord Captain did report that everything is fine. Something about {rt_mf|his|her} voice wasn't quite right... But then again, the Proctor is there too..."

{n}Abelard furrows his brow — what he just heard does not sit well with the old officer.{/n} "Oh, I feel uneasy, even though the Lord Captain did report that everything is fine. Something about {rt_mf|his|her} voice wasn't quite right... Then again, the Proctor is there too..."

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德皱起了眉头。刚刚他听到的那些话，让这位年迈的军官忧心忡忡。{/n}“噢，虽然舰长大人刚刚说一切都很好，可我还是不太放心。{rt_mf|他|她}的声音好像有点不太对劲……但话说回来，那位监察官也陪在{rt_mf|他|她}身边……”
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard furrows his brow — what he just heard does not sit well with the old officer.{/n} "Oh, I feel uneasy, even though the Lord Captain did report that everything is fine. Something about {rt_mf|his|her} voice wasn't quite right... Then again, the Proctor is there too..."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德皱起了眉头。刚刚他听到的那些话，让这位年迈的军官忧心忡忡。{/n}“噢，虽然舰长大人刚刚说一切都很好，可我还是不太放心。{rt_mf|他|她}的声音好像有点不太对劲……但话说回来，那位监察官也陪在{rt_mf|他|她}身边……”

languages.text: {n}Abelard frunce el ceño. Lo que acaba de oír el viejo oficial no le agrada.{/n} «Me siento intranquilo, pese a que {rt_mf|el|la} Lord Capitán ha informado de que todo iba bien. Había algo raro en su voz... Aunque el Procurador también está presente...».
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard furrows his brow — what he just heard does not sit well with the old officer.{/n} "Oh, I feel uneasy, even though the Lord Captain did report that everything is fine. Something about {rt_mf|his|her} voice wasn't quite right... Then again, the Proctor is there too..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard frunce el ceño. Lo que acaba de oír el viejo oficial no le agrada.{/n} «Me siento intranquilo, pese a que {rt_mf|el|la} Lord Capitán ha informado de que todo iba bien. Había algo raro en su voz... Aunque el Procurador también está presente...».

languages.text: {n}Az önce duydukları hoşuna gitmeyen Abelard, kaşlarını çatıyor.{/n} "Lord Kaptan her şeyin yolunda olduğunu ifade etmiş olsa da içim rahat değil. Sesinde bir tuhaflık vardı... Gelgelelim Üsteğmen de oradaydı..."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard furrows his brow — what he just heard does not sit well with the old officer.{/n} "Oh, I feel uneasy, even though the Lord Captain did report that everything is fine. Something about {rt_mf|his|her} voice wasn't quite right... Then again, the Proctor is there too..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Az önce duydukları hoşuna gitmeyen Abelard, kaşlarını çatıyor.{/n} "Lord Kaptan her şeyin yolunda olduğunu ifade etmiş olsa da içim rahat değil. Sesinde bir tuhaflık vardı... Gelgelelim Üsteğmen de oradaydı..."

languages.text: {n}アベラルドは眉をひそめた。聞いたばかりの話が、老練な士官の胸に引っかかっている。{/n}「ああ、ロード・キャプテンはすべて順調だと報告しておられたが、どうも落ち着かない。あの方の声には、どこか違和感があった…とはいえ、あそこには代理人もいるし…」
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard furrows his brow — what he just heard does not sit well with the old officer.{/n} "Oh, I feel uneasy, even though the Lord Captain did report that everything is fine. Something about {rt_mf|his|her} voice wasn't quite right... Then again, the Proctor is there too..."

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラルドは眉をひそめた。聞いたばかりの話が、老練な士官の胸に引っかかっている。{/n}「ああ、ロード・キャプテンはすべて順調だと報告しておられたが、どうも落ち着かない。あの方の声には、どこか違和感があった…とはいえ、あそこには代理人もいるし…」

languages.text: {n}Abélard fronce les sourcils. Le vieil officier n'apprécie pas ce qu'il vient d'entendre.{/n} « Oh, j'ai un mauvais pressentiment, même si {rt_mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} a déclaré que tout allait bien. J'ai perçu quelque chose dans sa voix... Mais bon, le proctor l'accompagne... »
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard furrows his brow — what he just heard does not sit well with the old officer.{/n} "Oh, I feel uneasy, even though the Lord Captain did report that everything is fine. Something about {rt_mf|his|her} voice wasn't quite right... Then again, the Proctor is there too..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abélard fronce les sourcils. Le vieil officier n'apprécie pas ce qu'il vient d'entendre.{/n} « Oh, j'ai un mauvais pressentiment, même si {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} a déclaré que tout allait bien. J'ai perçu quelque chose dans sa voix... Mais bon, le proctor l'accompagne... »

languages.text: {n}Abelard runzelt die Stirn. Was er gerade gehört hat, gefällt dem alten Offizier gar nicht.{/n} "Oh, ich habe ein ungutes Gefühl, obwohl der Lord Captain gemeldet hat, dass alles in Ordnung ist. {rt_mf|Seine|Ihre} Stimme war irgendwie anders ... Andererseits ist der Proktor auch dort ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard furrows his brow — what he just heard does not sit well with the old officer.{/n} "Oh, I feel uneasy, even though the Lord Captain did report that everything is fine. Something about {rt_mf|his|her} voice wasn't quite right... Then again, the Proctor is there too..."
